solution_line_template: If there were {total_students} students on the field and {fraction_looked_up} of the students looked up at the flying plane, {fraction_looked_up}*{total_students} = <<{fraction_looked_up}*{total_students}={students_looked_up}>>{students_looked_up} students saw the plane.
Since each student has two eyes, the number of eyes that looked at the plane is {eyes_per_student}*{students_looked_up} = <<{eyes_per_student}*{students_looked_up}={total_eyes}>>{total_eyes} years.
